An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity. martin Luther King Jr

At the University of Hartford we prioritize inclusivity and strive to improve our community each day PERIOD

Thats why the Best Buddies organization at UHART is excited to announce Best Buddies Gameday an event that brings together University students and staff with members of our Intellectual and Developmental Disability community IDD for a funfilled night of board games coloring and more to brighten everyones day

Date Saturday September sixteenth
Time  P.M PERIOD   P.M PERIOD
Location GSU Room  andor 

For additional information about this event please contact Emily Rutledge at emailprotected Everyone is welcome to participate PERIOD We hope to see you there

Get involved with UHARTs Best Buddy program today by visiting this link Best Buddies UHART
